title: Ukraine-Russian War Infographics & Data Visuals
dc:creator: David McCandless
description: A collection of visualisations, maps and primers from around the web. We’ll keep this list updated. » Ukraine Maps: Tracking the Russian Invasion of Ukraine [New York Times] (their @nytgraphics twitter has good summaries) » Total Refugees from Ukraine, compared to other countries [Flowing Data] » Visualising the $13.6 billion US spend on Ukraine [New […]
content:encoded:
A collection of visualisations, maps and primers from around the web. We’ll keep this list updated.

» Ukraine Maps: Tracking the Russian Invasion of Ukraine [New York Times] (their @nytgraphics twitter has good summaries)
» Total Refugees from Ukraine, compared to other countries [Flowing Data]
